column5: Year's ago, I used Sportsmans Lodge for an outpost on the Cobham River. I called them back this year and they sold that cabin. They would not give me the information of who owns this now. Would anyone know? It is a different outfitter than Amik or Cobham River Lodge. Thanks!

It isnt the cabin you are talking about but Excellent Adventures owns an outpost,( Headwaters Lake) on the Cobham River watershed. Call them they might be able to help you. I have been to this one twice. Kevin
If you want to try something new Cobham River Lodge also has an Outpost Camp on the same system.www.cobham-river-lodge. The oupost camp is called Hidden Lake. Hope this helps.
Sorry wont let me edit that post, the address iswww.cobham-river-lodge.com
I've spent several weeks there. Now owned by Amik. They bumped the price by a bunch. Can't complain because their expenses have gone up.It's a nice fishery.
